translations: n.生物，有机体，（尤指）微生物；有机组织，有机体系

sentences.sentence: Multiplication of cells leads to rapid growth of the organism.
sentences.translation: 细胞的繁殖导致有机体的迅速生长。

sentences.sentence: DNA carries the genetic blueprint which tells any organism how to build itself.
sentences.translation: 脱氧核糖核酸带有决定有机体形成方式的遗传型板。
